situation: C often felt frustrated and didn't participate in group reading activities due to difficulty focusing and following text.
action: The teacher aide incorporated multi-sensory reading techniques like colored overlays and audiobooks during group readings. They encouraged C to take breaks when needed to maintain focus.
effect: C showed improved participation and engagement in reading activities, as he could follow along more comfortably. The alternative methods catered to his learning needs, making group interaction more accessible and enjoyable.
